name: Hotel Caesar Prague

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very nice stay. Hotel is in a great location, very clean and excellent value for money. We used public transport, bus then metro to get there and was very easy/cheap.
reviews.title: Very good value
Grand Room
reviews.text: We stayed at this hotel for 4 nights at the end of June 2007 and found it to be really good quality. The hotel was very clean with modern, grand decorations. The rooms were cleaned every day and the staff were very helpful and friendly (for example we requested an iron and it was in our room before we even got back and we were only gone 5 minutes!) It seemed peaceful as well despite being close to the centre. We walked everywhere and did not need to use public transport at all as all the main sights were within walking distance. The hotel is about 15 minutes walk from Charles Bridge and Wencelesas Square.

Hotel is well located about 10-15 mins walk to Charles Bridge and about 15 mins or so to the Old Town Square etc. Unlike previous reviews we found this hotel just far enough off the main area to be away from the noise and were not disturbed at all, we were facing a side street though so may be worth asking for a room facing that way. Rooms are spacious with plenty of storage space and a safe. Breakfast offers a great selection of breads, pastries, fruits, cereals, yoghurts, cheese etc. There are some hot things (mostly scrambled eggs and beans) too, although not so much of a selection there. I think this hotel deserves its 4 star rating and would definitely recommend it.
reviews.title: Great Location and definitely worth a visit

likes.disliked: — If I had to choose anything I guess they could have more of a selection of hot foods at breakfast.

reviews.text: The good things about the hotel:
reviews.title: not what i expected

likes.disliked: — the floors with no carpets, the smell

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: -it is in walking distance of the city's historical center
reviews.title: Great location and superb if on a budget

reviews.text: -it is located on a busy street so it was ok to walk there by night
reviews.title: Not 4 but 3 stars

likes.disliked: — Construction site opposite to the hotel, some of the reception staff

reviews.text: The hotel was located fairly close to the centre of Prague - on the river, about 10-15 minutes walk from the Charles Bridge.
reviews.title: Very good value hotel, fairly central in Prague

likes.liked: — Flexibility of staff to allow is to check in early

reviews.text: The hotel's facilities were good and the breakfast was decent enough, despite the inclusion of boiled vegetables and salami-style sausage, which was strange!
reviews.title: Great Hotel

reviews.text: The rooms were very good, comfortable and fairly spacious. I have never known a mini bar so cheap, with beers about the equivalent of £1 a can, not that you need them with all teh bars about.
reviews.title: Clean and Central

reviews.text: Check in was excellent. We arrived 4 hours before check in time, just hoping to drop off our luggage, but our rooms were ready, which was excellent. Check out was also trouble free.
reviews.title: On the whole, it was good
First Class Hotel
reviews.text: Barely any negatives, but if I were being picky, I would have liked to have had some form of iron or trouser press in the room. Also, the bar seemed a tad overpriced at about £2 for a bottle of beer; cheap by UK standards, but in the town, beers averaged about a pound a pint.

description: Welcome to the Caesar Prague Hotel in Prague, a 4 star hotel situated an old building in Art Nouveau style, completely renovated and situated in the historical centre of Prague. After a few minutes' walk you can admire National Theatre, the Charles Bridge, Wenceslas Square or enjoy a beautiful view of Prague Castle from famous cafe Slavia. Caesar Prague Hotel offers you a wide range of services in an elegant and comfortable setting.
